title: The Last Hearth
description: The Red Weeping is spiraling into a true city-wide epidemic. You must deliver the infected samples directly to the high alchemists at the Ember-Flame Hearth to begin synthesizing a cure before the city dies not of Scourge, but of disease.

turns.narrative: Your path to the Core is blocked by a swarm of Vermin that have been infected by the Weeping. Their bites transmit the disease instantly.
turns.choice_a: Use massive area-denial fire magic to forge a safe path
turns.consequence_a: The fire cleanses the street perfectly. You walk to the Core unharmed by rats or disease.
turns.choice_b: Sprint through the alleyway relying on agility
turns.consequence_b: You navigate the swarm perfectly, but one rat drops onto your shoulder, delivering a glancing bite.

turns.narrative: You present the samples to Vora. She runs a swift analysis. 'This is no natural plague. This was engineered to trigger off starvation.'
turns.choice_a: Demand she make a cure immediately
turns.consequence_a: She agrees, but requires massive alchemical resources she doesn't have.
turns.consequence_b: She points to a bio-signature match in the deep Undercity. 'The Bio-Ward. They released it.' It unlocks the path to SQ-ELITE-PLAGUE.

cure_research_begun.description: You delivered the samples and began the desperate research for a cure.

plague_origin_traced.description: You delivered the samples and identified the Bio-Ward as the origin of the Red Weeping.

conclusion: You delivered the samples and began the desperate research for a cure.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
